com.st.st25sdk.ndef

Class WifiRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.ndef.NDEFRecord
      • com.st.st25sdk.ndef.WifiRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WifiRecord
extends NDEFRecord
    WifiRecord is the class in charge of reading/writing WiFi NDEF records Those records are used to implement WiFi Direct Device Pairing using NFC
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
